id.description: Unique identifier for the attached item.

parent_item_id.description: Identifier of the parent item to which this attached item is attached.

item_id.description: Identifier of the item to which this attached item belongs.

status.description: Current status of the attached item.

quantity.description: Quantity of the attached item included in the parent item.

quantity_in_decimal.description: Quantity of the attached item in decimal format.

billing_cycles.description: Number of billing cycles associated with the attached item.

charge_on_event.description: Indicates when the attached item should be charged.

charge_once.description: Flag to determine if the attached item should be charged only once.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the attached item was created.

resource_version.description: Version of the attached item resource for tracking changes.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the attached item was last updated.

object.description: Type of object representing the attached item.

custom_fields.description: Any additional custom fields associated with the attached item.
